sourcesContent:
import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; export default function Timer({seconds,onTimeout}){const [time,setTime]=useState(seconds); useEffect(()=>{const id=setInterval(()=>{setTime(t=>{if(t<=1){clearInterval(id); onTimeout(); return 0;}return t-1;});},1000); return ()=>clearInterval(id);},[onTimeout,seconds]); return
Time left: {time}s
; }
